OmniScript.description: Demonstrates how a single document can be generated using a DOCX or PPTX template. Uses VF page for generation.
OmniScript.name: Single Doc - DOCX (VF)

childElements.name: ObjectId
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "controlWidth" : 12, "debounceValue" : 0, "defaultValue" : null, "disOnTplt" : false, "help" : false, "helpText" : "", "hide" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "label" : "Object Id", "mask" : "", "maxLength" : 255, "minLength" : 0, "pattern" : "", "ptrnErrText" : "", "readOnly" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "required" : true, "show" : null, "showInputWidth" : false }

childElements.name: ValidateMessage

childElements.description:
For validation purposes
Required Variables: templateId, contextId, templateType
childElements.name: ValidateVariables
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "dataType" : null, "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "disOnTplt" : false, "expression" : "AND( AND( AND( %templateId% != NULL, %contextId% != NULL ), %templateType% != NULL), AND( %templateId% != '', %contextId% != ''), %templateType% != '')", "hide" : true, "hideGroupSep" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "label" : null, "mask" : null, "show" : null, "showInputWidth" : false }

omniProcessElements.description: Optional settings that can be changed to customize document generation
omniProcessElements.name: Set Generation Options

omniProcessElements.name: Set Values
